Detailed Description

This class encapsulates the SR-GCWS methodology.

Authors:
Angel A. Juan, Miquel Gilibert, Marcos Fernandez

Outputs srgcwscs.SRGCWSCS.solveInTime (  ) 

Solve the VRP problem returning an Output manager instance. Number of iterations will depend on time.

Remarks:
Builds a simple CWS solutions and a randomized improved solution.The number of iterations alone depends on the variable maxtime in Test aTest
Returns:
Outputs - instance to manage the results
See also:
solveInTimeAndIterations() splitAndSolve()

Outputs srgcwscs.SRGCWSCS.solveInTimeAndIterations (  ) 

Solve the VRP problem returning an Output manager instance. Number of iterations will depend on time and a maximum limit of iterations.

Remarks:
Builds a simple CWS solutions and a randomized improved solution.The multi start process is being limited by time and interations
Returns:
Outputs - instance to manage the results
See also:
solveInTime() splitAndSolve()

Definition at line 103 of file SRGCWSCS.java.

Here is the call graph for this function:

Outputs srgcwscs.SRGCWSCS.splitAndSolve (  ) 

Solve the VRP problem returning an Output manager instance. Number of iterations will depend on time.

Remarks:
Builds a simples CWS solutions and a randomized improved solution and applies the splitting technique.The number of iterations alone depends on the variable maxtime in Test aTest
Returns:
Outputs - instance to manage the results
See also:
solveInTime() solveInTimeAndIterations()
